text:
<@U033G4KN4TD>
cc: <@U0331FZS7JT>

instagramでお客様にメッセージを送る際の参考例文です。
僕はこれを送ってますので、参考にしてみてください。
※他に何か良い文章があれば教えて貰えたら嬉しいです！

ーーーーー
Hi!
This is Koshiro of TOUSUIEN.

I saw your instagram post and was interested in your products.
So now I texting you.

I am a Japanese tea company.
We sells tea wholesale. And we have a lot of exporting experience.

We have our own tea garden and factory in Shimane Japan. And our matcha is characterized by its bright green color.
Would you like to use it for matcha latte, or matcha taste in your drinks?
If you are interested in trying different samples, please do try our matcha!

We can ship samples immediately.

Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
ーーーーーー

elements.text:
instagramでお客様にメッセージを送る際の参考例文です。
僕はこれを送ってますので、参考にしてみてください。
※他に何か良い文章があれば教えて貰えたら嬉しいです！

ーーーーー
Hi!
This is Koshiro of TOUSUIEN.

I saw your instagram post and was interested in your products.
So now I texting you.

I am a Japanese tea company.
We sells tea wholesale. And we have a lot of exporting experience.

We have our own tea garden and factory in Shimane Japan. And our matcha is characterized by its bright green color.
Would you like to use it for matcha latte, or matcha taste in your drinks?
If you are interested in trying different samples, please do try our matcha!

We can ship samples immediately.

Thank you

text:
※必要に応じてこんな文章も付け加えてます。
In addition, we have contract farmers throughout Japan, so we can prepare matcha from various regions such as Kyoto, Shizuoka, Mie, Fukuoka, and Kagoshima.

elements.text:
※必要に応じてこんな文章も付け加えてます。
In addition, we have contract farmers throughout Japan, so we can prepare matcha from various regions such as Kyoto, Shizuoka, Mie, Fukuoka, and Kagoshima.

text:
<@U033G4KN4TD>
cc: <@U0331FZS7JT>

そして、お客様から返信が来たら、
まずこれを確認しています。
ーーーーー
Thank you for your quick reply.
I am very very happy to hear from you.

Could you please tell me the following four points to consider when selecting samples. I would like to know what is important to you.
If you have no particular preference, I will select my recommendation and offer it to you.

● Do you have a preferred price range? (e.g., usd100 or less, etc.)
●Do you have a preference for a single variety?
●Do you have a preference for the region of origin?
●Do you have a preference for organic or pesticide-free?

As soon as I know your preferences, I will submit a quotqtion.

If any of them interest you, I will send you samples for a flat rate of USD30 including shipping, regardless of the quantity of samples.

Anyway,
Thanks for your reply.
ーーーーー

ーーーーー

text:
あくまでも参考に確認してみてください。
英語でも中国語でも自由に！
